about_the_game:
Broken Time: Demo invites you to step into a thrilling world where time moves only when you do — but in a streamlined format! This low-poly action game places you in a post-apocalyptic reality where every second counts, and survival depends on your tactics and reflexes.

Demo Features:

- Limited levels: Explore a selection of initial locations to familiarize yourself with the game mechanics.

- Fewer weapon types: The demo includes a smaller range of randomly generated items, but enough to showcase the uniqueness of the combat system!

- Intense battles: Challenge yourself with fights where every move can turn the tide of combat.

- Time-manipulation mechanics: Your speed and decisions control the flow of time, allowing you to strategize every step.

- Atmospheric music: Immerse yourself in the game with the captivating soundtracks that set the tone for your adventure.

- Destroyable enemies: Experience the dynamic feel of combat with visual effects as foes shatter upon defeat.

Broken Time: Demo is your first step into a unique world where strategy meets speed. Take on the initial challenges and decide if you're ready for the full version!

content_descriptors.notes:
Broken Time:DEMO - includes elements of violence and brutal combat mechanics. Players use various weapons, including piercing and cutting tools, to fight enemies, which disintegrate into fragments upon death. These scenes are accompanied by bloody visual effects and intense destruction animations, which may be inappropriate for more sensitive players.

The weapons in the game have varying degrees of destructive power, making each fight unique and dangerous. There are also firearms and piercing weapons such as machetes. Enemies are inflicted with serious damage, including bloody effects and shattering into fragments, which creates vivid and visually impressive scenes.
